= Getting Started =

We use [http://ant.apache.org/ivy/ apache ivy] as dependency manager, please install it first.

Export HelloService and visit it in two styles, invoke all of them in two steps  

* Coding style
  
   # Run HelloServiceExporter in example/src
   # Run HelloServiceClientTest in example/test

* Spring configuration style

   # Run SpringHelloServiceExporter in example/src
   # Run SpringHelloServiceClientTest in example/test
